QuestData.Title: Of No Consequence
QuestData.Description: Our forces in Pyrewood were recently taken by way of sneak attack. The 7th Legion managed to infiltrate the town with their scouts, ultimately decimating our troops.$B$BThe Dark Lady has tasked us with a rescue mission. We are to find survivors and get them out of Pyrewood safely. If any soldiers live they are likely worthless, but we do as the Dark Lady commands.$B$BLet's get this nonsense over with, $n. Pyrewood is directly southwest of the Forsaken Front.
QuestData.CompletionText: The sooner we rescue survivors the sooner we can burn down the whole of Pyrewood.
QuestData.RewardText: What happened here today is between us. Say a word to anyone and you will find yourself in a corpse pit next to these poor fools.
